description:
The power dwelling within the heroic spirit of the eigth card rivaled the gods of myth... Sensing the hopeless difference in their power, Illya and the others escape from the Mirror World. But before they have a chance to breathe, a shock assails their whole party. The Mirror World rends apart, and the heroic spirit appears forth. As if mocking the bewildered group, the heroic spirit begins circling around in the air before finally acting--his goal: the great cavern where the Holy Grail sleeps.
Source: crunchyroll
